traits.name: Floral Camouflage
traits.desc: While the moose remains motionless and is lying down, it is indistinguishable from a large log covered in mushrooms.

traits.name: Poisonous Exterior
traits.desc: The mushrooms that coat the moose's body are poisonous and deadly to most other creatures. A creature that touches the moose or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 (1d10) poison damage.

traits.name: Rapid Regrowth
traits.desc: The mushroom moose has unnatural regenerative capabilities. At the beginning of each of the moose's turns, as long as it is in direct sunlight and it has at least 1 hit point, it regains 4 (1d8) hit points.

actions.name: Ram
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.
